author: Glynda Alves
title: Bhavin Turakhia's 7 tips to WFH like a boss
description: Bhavin Turakhia's 7 tips to WFH like a bossThe Flock CEO suggests beating the rush of distractions by starting work as early as you can.
content:
Man on the go, Bhavin Turakhia, CEO, Flock, knows what it’s like to make your workspace work for you, irrespective of where it is. And now, he too is working from home, but this remote setup is something he’s used to. 
“Millions of people are now working rem… [+6129 chars]
